directions.dialogText: We've written some code to get you through this level. Add \`fire\` between the \`''\` in \`cast('')\` then run the code.

levels.mission: Say the magic words to open all the gates and cast spells to destroy the obstacles. \`cast('fire')\` melts ice obstacles.
levels.tips: Try one gate at a time. Type the function in the code panel and press the step forward button. Then add another line of code and test it in the same way. Once the gates are open, destroy the fire and ice obstacles in order from left to right.

directions.dialogText: This time, fill in \`fire\` and \`ice\` into each \`cast('')\` to pass this level.

levels.mission: Say the magic words to open all the gates and cast spells to destroy the obstacles. \`cast('fire')\` melts ice obstacles and \`cast('ice')\` freezes fire obstacles.
levels.tips: Try one gate at a time. Type the function in the code panel and press the step forward button. Then add another line of code and test it in the same way. Once the gates are open, destroy the fire and ice obstacles in order from left to right.

directions.dialogText: Now you're on your own! Say magic words to open gates and cast spells to destroy the obstacles and help the wizard escape the dungeon.
